stimulusHtml: Which of the following statements best characterizes the state of civil society in Russia?
choicesHtml: It is largely made up of internationally funded watchdog groups.
It has attracted little interest from foreign governments and nongovernmental organizations.
It is dominated by a large-scale movement for a return to state communism.
It is weak in comparison with civil society in European democracies.
It is more constrained under Putin than it was under the Soviet Union.
